metadata.description: Marketplace for Claude Code skills and plugin development tools

plugins.name: skills-toolkit
plugins.description: Create and manage Claude Code skills, plugins, subagents, and hooks. Use when building new skills, validating existing skills, creating plugins, converting projects to plugins, creating hooks, or managing plugin automation. Includes /skills-toolkit:create-skill, /skills-toolkit:create-plugin, /skills-toolkit:create-subagent, and /skills-toolkit:create-hook commands.
